name: Gravity Game (Alpha)
description:
Welcome to Gravity Game! (working title) 

This is a game I am working on as a personal project. It is currently in its very early stages of development, but I plan on flushing it out and creating a full experience. None of the assets are done by me, they can all be found using the link below. Everything else I did on my own, level design, movement, gravity, and everything else you see here.

Use AD to move Left/Right and SPACE to jump and double Jump

When you collect a crystal, press "W" to change your gravity!

Enjoy! :)

Assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/free-pixel-space-platform-pack-146318
